author: PRWEB
title: Alpenland Sporthotel to introduce Alpine Wellness and Relaxation Program
text:
Quality is at the forefront of everything ARI does. Salzburg, Austria
Salzburg, Austria (July 2015) Alpenland Sporthotel St. Johann and Alpenland Sporthotel Maria Alm,two full service resorts nestled in the heart of the picturesque Austrian Alps anda short drive from the festival city of Salzburg, Austria will offer a special wellness program to guests during the fall months of October and November 2015.
Since there is no better place to focus on health and wellness than the majestic Austrian Alps, the fitness staff has put together an all-encompassing week-long wellness program. The program includes Nordic walking and hiking, Yoga and Pilates, a visit to the Thermal Spas of Bad Hofgastein, biking along the Salzach River, as well as health conscious inspired breakfast and dinner menus. Guests at both resorts can indulge in wellness and relaxation through use of indoor swimming pools, saunas, solariums, and fitness centers. The resortsâ€™ in town locations are ideal for exploring and taking in the local culture during down time. Guests have walking access to shops, local historical sites, nature trails while surrounded by the natural beauty of all that this region has to offer!
Quality is at the forefront of everything ARI does. From its pristine resorts and their fabulous locations to the food and service that they provide, the highest quality is always ARI's goal. While holding numerous prestigious awards for exceptional quality and service ARI still continuously strives for more. ARI was also instrumental in creating the globally recognized trade association, Cooperative Association of Resort Exchangers (C.A.R.E.); an organization designed to help foster good customer service and to meet consumer expectations throughout the industry.
For more information and to make reservations, visit http://www.alpenland-sporthotels.com/ .
About American Resorts International, Inc.
American Resorts International Holiday Network, Ltd. and the St. Johann Alpenland Resort Corporation represent the finest in timeshare and resort development products. With over 30 years in managing and supporting five-star full service resorts, ARIHN and the SJARC are industry leaders with a strong commitment to service and customer satisfaction.
American Resorts International, Inc. is a part of the Sonnenschein Groupe.
